str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
A shrinking, drawing back. From hupostello; shrinkage, i.e. apostasy.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Destruction, ruin, loss, perishing; eternal ruin. From a presumed derivative of apollumi; ruin or loss.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Acquiring, obtaining, possessing, possession, ownership. From peripoieomai; acquisition; by extension, preservation.
From psucho; breath, i.e. spirit, abstractly or concretely.
